mapper.select: SELECT QNA_NO, TITLE, REG_DATE, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM QNA_TBL WHERE PARENT_QNA_NO = q.QNA_NO) THEN '답변완료' ELSE '미답변' END AS REPLY_STATUS FROM QNA_TBL q WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PARENT_QNA_NO IS NULL ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

SELECT QNA_NO, TITLE, MEMBER_ID, REG_DATE, PARENT_QNA_NO, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM QNA_TBL WHERE PARENT_QNA_NO = q.QNA_NO) THEN '답변완료' ELSE '미답변' END AS REPLY_STATUS FROM QNA_TBL q WHERE PARENT_QNA_NO IS NULL ORDER BY CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM QNA_TBL WHERE PARENT_QNA_NO = q.QNA_NO) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ASC, QNA_NO DESC

SELECT QNA_NO, TITLE, MEMBER_ID, REG_DATE, PARENT_QNA_NO, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM QNA_TBL WHERE PARENT_QNA_NO = q.QNA_NO) THEN '답변완료' ELSE '미답변' END AS REPLY_STATUS FROM QNA_TBL q WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PARENT_QNA_NO IS NULL
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM QNA_TBL WHERE PARENT_QNA_NO = q.QNA_NO)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM QNA_TBL WHERE PARENT_QNA_NO = q.QNA_NO)
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC
